wikipedia_page.main: Sandy Scott (17 November 1922 – 1995) was a Scottish footballer who played in the Football League for Carlisle United and Leicester City.

response: Two years later, in August 1949, Kirkman joined fellow Second Division club, Leicester City, for a fee of £8,500. Although he made five appearances at the start of the 1949–50 season, he lost his place, firstly to Sandy Scott and then to Ron Jackson, before a return to the side in March for the final seven matches of the season.
